globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' https: data: blob:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline' https:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https:; img-src 'self' https: data: blob:; font-src 'self' https: data:; connect-src 'self' https:; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self';
